meanings.definition: A pair of crossed wooden or metal beams with a sign indicating a railroad crossing.
meanings.sent1: The train slowed down as it approached the crossbucks.
meanings.sent2: The crossbucks at the intersection helped drivers know when a train was coming.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought the crossbucks were giant sticks playing a game of X.
meanings.sent4: Her arms crossed like crossbucks, forming an X shape.
meanings.sent5: The bright red paint on the crossbucks made them stand out against the green trees.

meanings.definition: A warning sign at a railroad crossing consisting of two crossed white boards with the letters 'RR' in black.
meanings.sent1: The old railroad had rusty crossbucks that needed repainting.
meanings.sent2: Drivers should always pay attention to the crossbucks near train tracks.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the crossbucks were secret gates to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes met his across the room, their gazes crossing like crossbucks.
meanings.sent5: The loud sound of the train horn echoed near the crossbucks, warning everyone of its approach.
